warsha 1955 di shri lankawa eksath jathinge sanwidhanaye samajikathwaya labimen anathuruwa yuddha hamuda palamu eksath jathinge meheyum bhata pirisa aprikanu mahadwipaye kongo rajya bala pitathwa giya athara, yuddha hamuda samajikayin 16 deneku athulath wu ema kandayama warsha 1960 di sama sadhaka meheyum aarambha kota warsha 1962 di awasan karana ladi.
ape wiga්rahaya awasanayedi apa kiwe meyayi.
ape paramparawa adatath pasalata dakwanne siya mawata dakwana tharame senehasaki.
eseda wuwath aashraya karannangen barapathala lesa karadara, sith thawul athikala haki nisa tharamak iwasilimathwada, buddhimathwada kriya kala yuthuyi.
sammatha nila andum laba dena athara hakithak durata eekakari swarupayak labena paridi owunge konda kapa rawul bama sidu kere.
“oyage hitha ridewi kiyala wagema oyata waradak karannath mage hitha ida denne nathi nisa man kampas eke pirimi lamayi ekka wadiya kathawata yanneth na.”
mudrana katayuthu aashritha wyaparikayanta labha athwe.
yahapathayi chulla thudilayo maniyan sitina thanata wewula banan kara giyaha.
